page.title: 11NORTON HOUSE FARM,STOCKTON
page.content: THIS IS A TENANT FARM OF 2O FIELDS COVERING 128HA.,MANGED BY MR, N. DALTON.THE FARM WAS ESTABLISHED IN 19OO AND IS SITUATED IN THE VILLAGE OF NORTON.THE FARM EMPLOYS 5 MEN(ALTHOUGH LABOUR IS SHARED WITH ANOTHER FARM OWNED BY MR.DALTON AT SUTTON MADDOCK). THIS FARM IS HIGHLY MECHANISED. THE MAIN FARM PRODUCTS ARE WHEAT, BARLEY, SUGAR BEET, POTATOES, FAT CATTLE AND PIGS. THE CATTLE ARE HEREFORD CROSS FRIESIAN CROSS CHAROLLAIS,THEY ARE ALL BOUGHT AT MARKET,FATTENED AND THEN SOLD DEADWEIGHT.THE PIGS ARE LANDRACE CROSSES AND ARE BRED ON THE FARM. THE BEET & POTATOES ARE SOWN IN SPRING AND HARVESTED AUGUST TO OCTOBER,THE HWEAT IS SOWN IN AUTUMN WHILST THE BARLEY IS SPRING AND ALL ARE HARVESTED IN JULY.
